channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Spectrum Protect Plus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Spectrum Protect Plus

item.title: CVE-2020-4206|2024-08-04T08:00:06.980Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20plus
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Plus 10.1.0 through 10.1.5 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system in the context of root user, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. IBM X-Force ID: 174966.

item.title: CVE-2020-4210|2024-08-04T08:00:07.357Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20plus
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Plus 10.1.0 and 10.1.5 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By using a specially crafted HTTP command, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary command on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 175020.

item.title: CVE-2021-39063|2024-08-04T01:58:18.103Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20plus
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Plus 10.1.0.0 through 10.1.8.x uses Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) which could allow an attacker to carry out privileged actions and retrieve sensitive information due to a misconfiguration in access control headers. IBM X-Force ID: 214956.

item.title: CVE-2020-4216|2024-08-04T08:00:07.363Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20plus
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Plus 10.1.0 through 10.1.5 contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key, which it uses for its own inbound authentication, outbound communication to external components, or encryption of internal data. IBM X-Force ID: 175066.

item.title: CVE-2020-4208|2024-08-04T08:00:07.375Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20plus
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Plus 10.1.0 through 10.1.5 contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key, which it uses for its own inbound authentication, outbound communication to external components, or encryption of internal data. IBM X-Force ID: 174975.

item.title: CVE-2020-4209|2024-08-04T08:00:07.110Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20plus
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Plus 10.1.0 through 10.1.5 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to create arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 175019.

item.title: CVE-2021-39057|2024-08-04T01:58:17.622Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20plus
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Plus 10.1.0.0 through 10.1.8.x is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 214616.

item.title: CVE-2020-4222|2024-08-04T08:00:07.356Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20plus
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Plus 10.1.0 and 10.1.5 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By using a specially crafted HTTP command, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary command on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 175091.

item.title: CVE-2020-4211|2024-08-04T08:00:06.882Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20plus
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Plus 10.1.0 and 10.1.5 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By using a specially crafted HTTP command, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary command on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 175022.

item.title: CVE-2020-4213|2024-08-04T08:00:07.373Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20plus
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Plus 10.1.0 and 10.1.5 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By using a specially crafted HTTP command, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary command on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 175024.

item.title: CVE-2020-4214|2024-08-04T08:00:06.911Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20plus
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Plus 10.1.0 through 10.1.5 could allow a remote attacker to arbitrary delete a directory caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. IBM X-Force ID: 175026.

item.title: CVE-2020-4212|2024-08-04T08:00:07.138Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20plus
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Plus 10.1.0 and 10.1.5 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By using a specially crafted HTTP command, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary command on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 175023.

item.title: CVE-2020-4240|2024-08-04T08:00:07.037Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20plus
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Plus 10.1.0 through 10.1.5 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to overwrite or create arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 175417.

item.title: CVE-2020-4241|2024-08-04T08:00:07.092Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20plus
item.description: IBM Spectrum Scale and IBM Spectrum Protect Plus 10.1.0 through 10.1.5 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system. By sending a specially crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 175418.

item.title: CVE-2020-4242|2024-08-04T08:00:07.335Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20plus
item.description: IBM Spectrum Scale and IBM Spectrum Protect Plus 10.1.0 through 10.1.5 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system. By sending a specially crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 175419.
